unnormalised: Hey, solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer, right? I heard the Maharashtra govt. is offering some decent discounts. My cousin, Priya in Bangalore, installed one last Diwali. Reduced her electricity bill by like, Rs. 2000 a month! Planning to get it done too, maybe before Onam. Imagine, guilt-free biryani, powered by the sun! Costs a bit upfront, maybe 2 lakhs, but pays for itself eventually. Plus, gotta do our bit for the environment, eh? Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey, solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer, right? I heard the Maharashtra government is offering some decent discounts. My cousin, Priya in Bangalore, installed one last Diwali. Reduced her electricity bill by like, rupee two thousand a month! Planning to get it done too, maybe before Onam. Imagine, guilt-free biryani, powered by the sun! Costs a bit upfront, maybe two lakh, but pays for itself eventually. Plus, got to do our bit for the environment, eh? Jai Hind!
